scripts.release: cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp del:effect && cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp swig_task && cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp css_task && cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp js_task && cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp images_task && gulp del:index && node index-res.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp effect_html && cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp effect_js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp effect_scss &&  cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp effect_img
scripts.normal: cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp swig_task && cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp css_task && cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp js_task && cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp images_task && gulp del:index && node index-res.js
scripts.dev: gulp swig_task && gulp css_task && gulp js_task && gulp images_task && gulp del:index && node index-res.js && gulp effect_html && gulp effect_js && gulp effect_scss && gulp effect_img
scripts.effect: cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp del:effect && cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp effect_html && cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp effect_js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp effect_scss &&  cross-env NODE_ENV=production gulp effect_img
